scripts.check:all: concurrently -n "format" "pnpm run check:format" && echo All checks passed!
scripts.all: pnpm run fix:all && pnpm run check:all
scripts.upgrade:deps: pnpm dlx npm-check-updates -u -p pnpm --peer --enginesNode && pnpm install
scripts.upgrade:all: pnpm run upgrade:pm && pnpm run upgrade:deps
scripts.all:upgrade: pnpm run upgrade:all && pnpm run all
scripts.reinstall: pnpm dlx rimraf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install
scripts.all:full-upgrade: pnpm run reinstall && pnpm run all:upgrade
